thread.title: First asylum seekers from 'caravan' enter U.S.

title: First asylum seekers from 'caravan' enter U.S.
text:
First asylum seekers from 'caravan' enter U.S. 6:15pm BST - 01:34
Eight women and children from a Central American caravan entered U.S. territory to seek asylum on Monday, after a month-long journey through Mexico that drew President Donald Trump's wrath.
Eight women and children from a Central American caravan entered U.S. territory to seek asylum on Monday, after a month-long journey through Mexico that drew President Donald Trump's wrath. //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/05/01/first-asylum-seekers-from-caravan-enter?videoId=422932832&videoChannel=13422
